titles.title: Internet of Things (IoT) Federal Cybersecurity Improvement Act of 2018
To provide minimal cybersecurity operational standards for Internet-connected devices purchased by Federal agencies, and for other purposes.
Internet of Things (IoT) Federal Cybersecurity Improvement Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Internet of Things (IoT) Federal Cybersecurity Improvement Act of 2018
This bill requires Internet-connected devices purchased by federal agencies to meet specified security requirements.
